  • 方法详细资料

    • validateInputs

      public String validateInputs(String username, String name, String gender, String ageText, String department, String password, String confirmPassword)
      Validates the registration inputs.
      参数:
      username - The username entered.
      name - The name entered.
      gender - The gender selected.
      ageText - The age entered as text.
      department - The department entered.
      password - The password entered.
      confirmPassword - The password confirmation entered.
      返回:
      null if all inputs are valid; otherwise, an error message.

    • isUserExists

      public boolean isUserExists(String username)
      Checks if a user with the given username already exists.
      参数:
      username - The username to check.
      返回:
      true if the user exists; false otherwise.

    • registerStudent

      public void registerStudent(Map<String,String> studentInfo) throws IOException
      Registers a new student by writing their information to the file.
      参数:
      studentInfo - A map containing the student's information.
      抛出:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • getAllStudents

      public Map<String,String> getAllStudents()
      Retrieves all students' data from the file.
      返回:
      A map where the key is the username and the value is the full record as a string.
